title: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ 1.4.0 released!
content: We are very pleased to announce the 1.4.0 release of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ. This release enhances codestarts support in the Quarkus project wizard. Codestarts The Quarkus project wizard now highlights codestarts enabled extension with a specific icon (right to the extension name), similar to code.quarkus.io, allowing users to better...
